name: Chandrashekher Prasad
aboutMe: Hello! I'm Chandrashekher, currently pursuing a B.Tech at Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology in New Delhi. As a second-year student, I'm dedicating my time to mastering data structures and algorithms with Java. I have a strong background in HTML and CSS, and I'm expanding my web development skills by learning React JS. I also have experience with programming languages such as C, Python, and JavaScript
